Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.view.cli.CLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewInterface

    public class CLI
extends java.lang.Object
implements ViewInterface
    This class represent the Command-Line Interface
